[Home](./index.md) &gt; [blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [FieldDropdown](./blockly.fielddropdown.md) &gt; [SERIALIZABLE](./blockly.fielddropdown.serializable.md)

## FieldDropdown.SERIALIZABLE property

Serializable fields are saved by the serializer, non-serializable fields are not. Editable fields should also be serializable.

**Signature:**

```typescript
SERIALIZABLE: boolean;
```
